tool_description: Analyzes email urgency and recipient patterns to recommend optimal response timing for maximum effectiveness and professional impression.

email_urgency.description: Urgency level of the email: immediate, high, medium, low

recipient_timezone.description: Recipient's time zone (e.g., UTC, EST, PST, GMT)

business_hours_only.description: Whether to restrict recommendations to business hours

day_of_week.description: Current day: monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday

error_messages: Invalid urgency level: Use one of [immediate, high, medium, low]
Invalid time zone: Provide a valid time zone identifier
Invalid day of week: Use full day names (monday, tuesday, etc.)
usage: Specify email_urgency and optionally set recipient_timezone, business_hours_only, and day_of_week. The tool provides optimal timing recommendations for sending the response.

recommended_send_time.description: Optimal time to send the response

response_window.description: Acceptable timeframe for response based on urgency

alternative_times.description: Alternative good times to send if primary time isn't suitable
